title: Bill Burr | Stephen Miller and Rudy Giuliani Try to Defend Trump: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how President Trump's friends and aides have abandoned him, leaving only Stephen Miller and Rudy Giuliani to defend him.

Bill Burr talks about his animated show F is for Family, environmentally sound parenting and shares his complex feelings on religion. Plus, what it's like to perform stand-up abroad and the conspiracy theory that drove him to pursue his helicopter license.

Burr also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G just for this podcast.
